001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils;
002
003import java.util.AbstractMap;
004import java.util.Arrays;
005import java.util.Map;
006import java.util.NavigableMap;
007import java.util.NavigableSet;
008import java.util.SequencedMap;
009import java.util.SequencedSet;
010import java.util.stream.Stream;
011
012import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreCollectors.toLinkedMap;
013import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreCollectors.toLinkedSet;
014import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreCollectors.toSortedMap;
015import static org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.utils.CoreCollectors.toSortedSet;
016
017/**
018 * Utility-class that provides methods to transform the stream or var-args-arrays of values into linked or sorted sets
019 * and stream or var-args-arrays of {@link Map.Entry entries} into linked or sorted map.
020 * An enumeration {@link MergeFunction} could be used to handle the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key}.
021 */
022public class CoreStreamUtils {
023
024    /**
025     * @param valuesArr var-args-arrays of values
026     * @return the sorted set of those values as {@link NavigableSet}
027     * @param <T> the type of value
028     */
029    @SafeVarargs
030    @SuppressWarnings("varargs")
031    public static <T extends Comparable<T>> NavigableSet<T> sortedSet(T... valuesArr) {
032        return sortedSet(Arrays.stream(valuesArr));
033    }
034
035    /**
036     * @param values stream of values
037     * @return the sorted set of those values as {@link NavigableSet}
038     * @param <T> the type of value
039     */
040    public static <T extends Comparable<T>> NavigableSet<T> sortedSet(Stream<T> values) {
041        return values.collect(toSortedSet());
042    }
043
044    /**
045     * @param valuesArr var-args-arrays of values
046     * @return the linked set of those values as {@link SequencedSet}
047     * @param <T> the type of value
048     */
049    @SafeVarargs
050    @SuppressWarnings("varargs")
051    public static <T> SequencedSet<T> linkedSet(T... valuesArr) {
052        return linkedSet(Arrays.stream(valuesArr));
053    }
054
055    /**
056     * @param values stream of values
057     * @return the linked set of those values as {@link SequencedSet}
058     * @param <T> the type of value
059     */
060    public static <T> SequencedSet<T> linkedSet(Stream<T> values) {
061        return values.collect(toLinkedSet());
062    }
063
064    /**
065     * A factory-method to produce an instance of {@link Map.Entry} from {@code key} and {@code value}.
066     *
067     * @param key a key of entry to create
068     * @param value a value of entry to create
069     * @return an instance of {@link Map.Entry} as {@link AbstractMap.SimpleEntry}
070     * @param <K> the type of key
071     * @param <V> the type of value
072     */
073    public static <K, V> Map.Entry<K, V> keyValue(K key, V value) {
074        return new AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<>(key, value);
075    }
076
077    /**
078     * The same as {@link #keyValue(Object, Object) keyValue(K key, V value)},
079     * but when the type of {@code key} is {@link String} (we can call such {@code key} as {@code name} in this case).
080     *
081     * @param name a name of entry to create
082     * @param value a value of entry to create
083     * @return an instance of {@link Map.Entry} as {@link AbstractMap.SimpleEntry}
084     * @param <V> the type of value
085     */
086    public static <V> Map.Entry<String, V> nameValue(String name, V value) {
087        return keyValue(name, value);
088    }
089
090    /**
091     * Transform the var-args-arrays of entries into the sorted map,
092     * where the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key} are merged
093     * with the default merge-function {@link MergeFunction#OVERWRITE}.
094     * <hr/>
095     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} all invalid entries are filtered out,
096     * where the filter is based on using {@link #entryIsValid(Map.Entry)} function.
097     *
098     * @param entriesArr var-args-arrays of entries
099     * @return the sorted map, which is collected from those entries, as {@link NavigableMap},
100     * @param <K> the type of key
101     * @param <V> the type of value
102     */
103    @SafeVarargs
104    @SuppressWarnings("varargs")
105    public static <K extends Comparable<K>, V> NavigableMap<K, V>
106    sortedMap(Map.Entry<K,V>... entriesArr) {
107        return sortedMap(Arrays.stream(entriesArr).filter(CoreStreamUtils::entryIsValid));
108    }
109
110    /**
111     * Transform the var-args-arrays of entries into the sorted map,
112     * where the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key} are merged
113     * with the passed {@code mergeFunction}.
114     * <hr/>
115     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} all invalid entries are filtered out,
116     * where the filter is based on using {@link #entryIsValid(Map.Entry)} function.
117     *
118     * @param mergeFunction the merge-function to handle the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key}
119     * @param entriesArr var-args-arrays of entries
120     * @return the sorted map, which is collected from those entries, as {@link NavigableMap},
121     * @param <K> the type of key
122     * @param <V> the type of value
123     */
124    @SafeVarargs
125    @SuppressWarnings("varargs")
126    public static <K extends Comparable<K>, V> NavigableMap<K, V>
127    sortedMap(MergeFunction mergeFunction, Map.Entry<K,V>... entriesArr) {
128        return sortedMap(mergeFunction, Arrays.stream(entriesArr));
129    }
130
131    /**
132     * Transform the var-args-arrays of entries into the sorted map,
133     * where the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key} are merged
134     * with the default merge-function {@link MergeFunction#OVERWRITE}.
135     * <hr/>
136     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} all invalid entries are filtered out,
137     * where the filter is based on using {@link #entryIsValid(Map.Entry)} function.
138     *
139     * @param entries stream of entries
140     * @return the sorted map, which is collected from those entries, as {@link NavigableMap},
141     * @param <K> the type of key
142     * @param <V> the type of value
143     */
144    public static <K extends Comparable<K>, V> NavigableMap<K, V>
145    sortedMap(Stream<Map.Entry<K,V>> entries) {
146        return entries.collect(toSortedMap(Map.Entry::getKey, Map.Entry::getValue));
147    }
148
149    /**
150     * Transform the var-args-arrays of entries into the sorted map,
151     * where the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key} are merged
152     * with the passed {@code mergeFunction}.
153     * <hr/>
154     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} all invalid entries are filtered out,
155     * where the filter is based on using {@link #entryIsValid(Map.Entry)} function.
156     *
157     * @param mergeFunction the merge-function to handle the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key}
158     * @param entries stream of entries
159     * @return the sorted map, which is collected from those entries, as {@link NavigableMap},
160     * @param <K> the type of key
161     * @param <V> the type of value
162     */
163    public static <K extends Comparable<K>, V> NavigableMap<K, V>
164    sortedMap(MergeFunction mergeFunction, Stream<Map.Entry<K,V>> entries) {
165        return entries.collect(toSortedMap(Map.Entry::getKey, Map.Entry::getValue, mergeFunction));
166    }
167
168    /**
169     * Transform the var-args-arrays of entries into the linked map,
170     * where the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key} are merged
171     * with the default merge-function {@link MergeFunction#OVERWRITE}.
172     * <hr/>
173     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} all invalid entries are filtered out,
174     * where the filter is based on using {@link #entryIsValid(Map.Entry)} function.
175     *
176     * @param entriesArr var-args-arrays of entries
177     * @return the linked map, which is collected from {@code entries}, as {@link SequencedMap},
178     * @param <K> the type of key
179     * @param <V> the type of value
180     */
181    @SafeVarargs
182    @SuppressWarnings("varargs")
183    public static <K, V> SequencedMap<K, V>
184    linkedMap(Map.Entry<K,V>... entriesArr) {
185        return linkedMap(Arrays.stream(entriesArr).filter(CoreStreamUtils::entryIsValid));
186    }
187
188    /**
189     * Transform the var-args-arrays of entries into the linked map,
190     * where the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key} are merged
191     * with the passed {@code mergeFunction}.
192     * <hr/>
193     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} all invalid entries are filtered out,
194     * where the filter is based on using {@link #entryIsValid(Map.Entry)} function.
195     *
196     * @param mergeFunction the merge-function to handle the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key}
197     * @param entriesArr var-args-arrays of entries
198     * @return the linked map, which is collected from {@code entries}, as {@link SequencedMap},
199     * @param <K> the type of key
200     * @param <V> the type of value
201     */
202    @SafeVarargs
203    @SuppressWarnings("varargs")
204    public static <K, V> SequencedMap<K, V>
205    linkedMap(MergeFunction mergeFunction, Map.Entry<K,V>... entriesArr) {
206        return linkedMap(mergeFunction, Arrays.stream(entriesArr));
207    }
208
209    /**
210     * Transform the stream of entries into the linked map,
211     * where the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key} are merged
212     * with the default merge-function {@link MergeFunction#OVERWRITE}.
213     * <hr/>
214     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} all invalid entries are filtered out,
215     * where the filter is based on using {@link #entryIsValid(Map.Entry)} function.
216     *
217     * @param entries stream of entries
218     * @return the linked map, which is collected from {@code entries}, as {@link SequencedMap},
219     * @param <K> the type of key
220     * @param <V> the type of value
221     */
222    public static <K, V> SequencedMap<K, V>
223    linkedMap(Stream<Map.Entry<K,V>> entries) {
224        return entries.collect(toLinkedMap(Map.Entry::getKey, Map.Entry::getValue));
225    }
226
227    /**
228     * Transform the var-args-arrays of entries into the linked map,
229     * where the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key} are merged
230     * with the passed {@code mergeFunction}.
231     * <hr/>
232     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} all invalid entries are filtered out,
233     * where the filter is based on using {@link #entryIsValid(Map.Entry)} function.
234     *
235     * @param mergeFunction the merge-function to handle the entries with the same {@link Map.Entry#getKey() key}
236     * @param entries stream of entries
237     * @return the linked map, which is collected from {@code entries}, as {@link SequencedMap},
238     * @param <K> the type of key
239     * @param <V> the type of value
240     */
241    public static <K, V> SequencedMap<K, V>
242    linkedMap(MergeFunction mergeFunction, Stream<Map.Entry<K,V>> entries) {
243        return entries.collect(toLinkedMap(Map.Entry::getKey, Map.Entry::getValue, mergeFunction));
244    }
245
246    /**
247     * In order to avoid {@link NullPointerException} in JDK's collectors
248     * all entries that are {@code null} or whose key or value is {@code null} should be filtered out.
249     *
250     * @param entry an entry to filter
251     * @return {@code true} if the entry is valid and otherwise - {@code false}
252     */
253    public static boolean entryIsValid(Map.Entry<?,?> entry) {
254        return entry != null && entry.getKey() != null && entry.getValue() != null;
255    }
256
257    // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
258
259    private CoreStreamUtils() {
260        // prohibit the creation of utility-class instance
261        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Cannot instantiate utility-class " + getClass().getName());
262    }
263}
